response.overview: Boogers, Fat Chicks, and Jovial Gang-Bangs.  They're just trailer-park trash!  Jim felter has created a masterpiece in the genre of suburban comedy. Stuffed follows the Puffin family and their vrious psychological disorders. Angora, the lesbophobic, overweight, white polyester pants-clad bitch in head seduces young boys (in between yelling "Lesbians!" at other women). In a hilarious scene, she raps her pants after seeing a cute boy in the middle of the supermarket. Later, she screws the guy in the closet of a record store as the customers steal everything. Any film that contains a scene where a cute baby is killed by a narcoleptic fat girl falling on it is tops in my book.
response.tagline: Boogers, Fat Chicks and Jovial Gang-Bangs
response.title: Stuffed!
